>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.oTrD06MdEikmixg6]{Regression}

You can spend 2 Entropy Points as a reaction to trigger a chain reaction when you deal damage with your entropic strike to an object or creature with the technological subtype. Choose another object or creature with the technological subtype within 30 feet of the first target, and make a second attack with your entropic strike at a –4 penalty. If you hit and can perform additional reactions that turn, you can use another reaction to perform a third attack against a different object or creature with the technological subtype.

You determine line of sight and the range of this attack starting from one corner of the first target’s space. The second attack is treated as an attack in a full attack for the purposes of abilities that reduce the penalties for full attacks.
